Package org.ejbca.config

Class GlobalConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.cesecore.configuration.ConfigurationBase
        • org.ejbca.config.GlobalConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ExternalScriptsConfiguration, IUpgradeableData
    public class GlobalConfiguration
extends ConfigurationBase
implements ExternalScriptsConfiguration, Serializable
    This is a class containing global configuration parameters.

      • getBaseUrl

        public String getBaseUrl()
        Returns:
        The base path (and not the URL as the name suggests). The name was kept to enable a smaller patch between EJBCA 6.15 and 7.0.

        public int getHardTokenEncryptCA()
        Returns:
        the caid of the CA that should encrypt hardtoken data in the database. if CAid is 0 is the data stored unencrypted.

      • setHardTokenEncryptCA

        public void setHardTokenEncryptCA​(int hardTokenEncryptCA)
        Parameters:
        hardTokenEncryptCA - the caid of the CA that should encrypt hardtoken data in the database. if CAid is 0 is the data stored unencrypted.
